CollapseAll.Title: Collapse All
CollapseAll.ShortHelp: Collapses all the children of the selected object.
ColumnVisibility.Title: Tree List View Options
ColumnVisibility.ShortHelp: Customizes the presentation of the tree display.
ProductToPart.Title: Product to part
ProductToPart.ShortHelp: Converts a product into a part.
ProductToPart.LongHelp:
Select a product and click Product to part.

The new part is created as a revision of the selected product and appears as a root.
DefineFilter.Title: Filter
DefineFilter.ShortHelp: Filter content based on attribute and configuration filters.
ExpandAll.Title: Expand All
ExpandAll.ShortHelp: Expands all the children of the selected object.
ExpandAll.LongHelp: The parent nodes containing only one 3D shape are collapsed. You can expand them manually to display the 3D shape.
ExpandN.Title: Expand N Levels
ExpandN.ShortHelp: Expands N levels of the selected objects.
ExpandN.LongHelp: The parent nodes containing only one 3D shape are collapsed. You can expand them manually to display the 3D shape.
ExportCSV.Title: Export
ExportCSV.ShortHelp: Exports the product structure as a .csv file.
ExportCSV.LongHelp: To select the columns you want to export, from the Tools section of the action bar, click Tree List View Options.
graphview.Title: Graph View
graphview.ShortHelp: Displays the product structure as a graph.
LayoutDown.Title: Down
LayoutLeft.Title: Left
LayoutRight.Title: Right
LayoutUp.Title: Up
Print.Title: Print
Print.ShortHelp: Prints the content of the viewer to the printer of your choice.
ReframeAll.Title: Fit All In
ReframeAll.ShortHelp: Fits the entire model in the 3D area.
ReframeOn.Title: Reframe On
ReframeOn.ShortHelp: Centers the selected object in the viewer.
RelationIPExplorer.Title: Relations
RelationIPExplorer.ShortHelp: Opens the Relations widget and displays the ecosystem of related objects.
SelectAll.Title: Select All Visible
SelectAll.ShortHelp: Selects all visible objects in the structure.
SelectChildren.Title: Select Children
SelectChildren.ShortHelp: Selects all the child objects of the selected objects recursively. The selected objects remains selected.
SelectInversion.Title: Select Inversion
SelectInversion.ShortHelp: Selects all the objects in the structure except the branch of the object you selected.
SelectInversion.LongHelp: If you do not select an object first, this command selects all objects in the structure, except the root.
SelectLeaves.Title: Select Leaves
SelectLeaves.ShortHelp: Selects the leaves of the selected objects. Leaves are objects that have no child object.
SelectLeaves.LongHelp: Selecting the leaf objects cancels the selection of the object you selected.
SelectParent.Title: Select Parent
SelectParent.ShortHelp: Selects the parent of the selected objects.
SelectParent.LongHelp: Selecting the parent object cancels the selection of the object you selected.
SelectSiblings.Title: Select Siblings
SelectSiblings.ShortHelp: Selects the sibling objects. Siblings are objects that share a parent with the currently selected object.
SelectSiblings.LongHelp: Selecting the sibling objects cancels the selection of the object you selected.
SwapThumbState.Title: Hide/Show Thumbnail
SwapThumbState.ShortHelp: In the thumbnail view, expands and collapses the structure.
thumbnailview.Title: Thumbnail View
thumbnailview.ShortHelp: Displays the product structure as thumbnails.
tileview.Title: Tile View
tileview.ShortHelp: Displays the product structure as tiles.
ToggleOverview.Title: Toggle Overview
treeview.Title: Tree View
treeview.ShortHelp: Displays the product structure as a tree.
treelistview.Title: Tree List View
treelistview.ShortHelp: Displays the product structure as a tree.
CloseSelectedCmd.Title: Close
FindInCtxCmd.Title: Find in Context
FindCmd.Title: Find
FindCmd.ShortHelp: Searches objects in the tree that contain a specific string of characters.
FocusOnCmd.Title: Focus On
HideIn3DCmd.Title: Hide in 3D
ShowIn3DCmd.Title: Show in 3D
CollapseThumbsCmd.Title: Collapse Thumbnail
ExpandThumbsCmd.Title: Expand Thumbnail
ExpandAllGroups.Title: Expand All Groups
FocusOnGroups.Title: Focus on Groups content
ColorizeGroup.Title: Colorize Group content
RemoveGroupColor.Title: Remove color on Groups
GroupsLayoutCompact.Title: Compact group layout
GroupsLayoutPath.Title: Structured group layout
CopyLink.Title: Copy Link
Download.Title: Download
